# Intellij로 접속하는 방법

## 1. Intellij에 접속해서 DataBase로 들어갑니다.

![스크린샷 2024-09-18 오전 2.05.40.png](Intellij%EB%A1%9C%20%EC%A0%91%EC%86%8D%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94%20%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95%202748c5ff8917814d9223e45898dbb025/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2024-09-18_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_2.05.40.png)

## 2. Data Source에서 MySQL을 클릭합니다.

![스크린샷 2024-09-18 오전 1.15.57.png](Intellij%EB%A1%9C%20%EC%A0%91%EC%86%8D%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94%20%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95%202748c5ff8917814d9223e45898dbb025/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2024-09-18_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_1.15.57.png)

## 3. Host, User, Password에 알맞은 값을 넣고 Test Connection을 눌러서 Succeeded가 나오면 성공입니다!

![스크린샷 2024-09-18 오전 1.59.27.png](Intellij%EB%A1%9C%20%EC%A0%91%EC%86%8D%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94%20%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95%202748c5ff8917814d9223e45898dbb025/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2024-09-18_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_1.59.27.png)
